function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Delay in intervention time leading to increased peak value, extended peak arrival time, and longer epidemic duration","Impact":"Higher number of new confirmed cases per day and prolonged epidemic duration","Mitigation":"Timely implementation of quarantine measures","Technologies":"Early warning systems, data analysis for trend identification","People":"General population, healthcare workers","Owner":"Government, public health authorities"},{"Description":"Unnecessary use of strict quarantines in mild epidemic situations","Impact":"Wastage of financial, material, and human resources","Mitigation":"Strategic assessment of epidemic severity to determine appropriate quarantine measures","Technologies":"Data analysis, epidemiological modeling","People":"Public health authorities, government officials","Owner":"Public health organizations, government agencies"},{"Description":"Demonstrated need for huge investment in financial, material, and human resources for strict quarantines","Impact":"Financial burden, resource depletion, and strain on healthcare systems","Mitigation":"Development of cost-effective quarantine measures, resource allocation strategies","Technologies":"Automation, surveillance technologies, telemedicine","People":"Government, healthcare organizations","Owner":"Public health organizations, government agencies"}]}
